name: Multi Step Form Plugin
author: Witoni Softwares

sections.description:
This plugin renders multi step form created using drag & drop builder in wp dashboard. There’s a varity of input fields
those can be used to create multi step form.

This is the best & simple wordpress user date emailing plugin with custom fields.

Plugin Demo

Employment Application Form Demo

Pizza Order Form Demo

Survey Form Demo

Appointment Request Form Demo

HAVING QUESTIONS ?

We’re Online (LIVE CHAT) Available

After successful installation, user would need to create a form and you can include unlimited steps or multi step levels to collect the user data.

Easy Multi Step Form provides you a built-in drag & drop builder to customize your form with different kind of input fields. All forms are Bootstrap ready which
means all forms would display & work perfect on different mobile screen resolutions.

After form creation you can also embed forms in any post/page or theme template using shortcodes. This would display your created multi step form into frontend to users or visitors and ready
to collect and email data.

This plugin also allows to redirect user to some specific url or show some custom message in popup after successful form submission. You can set different messages, redirection url and different emails for all different forms.

Easy to use

  • Easy Multi Step Form Wizard helps to create email forms in just 2-mins..
  • Works out of the box with every wordpress theme
  • Can integrate with any existing wordpress system

Mobile Responsive

  • Fully mobile optimized forms
  • Fully sliding layout without breakpoint
  • Awesome button & design looks

Drag & Drop Builder

  • Create Unlimited Steps in single form
  • Insert multiple fields in single form
  • Multiple input fields available in panel
  • Pass hidden fields for custom work

Fully Configurable

  • Manage form from CPT Panel
  • Copy/paste shortcode to show form in frontend
  • Put form shortcode in post/page or theme
  • Edit form in seconds

HOW TO USE

  • Download & Install Easy Multi Step Plugin
  • Click Over Multi Step Form Menu
  • Create Form and Step Fields
  • Copy Shortcode & Place in any post/page

Unlock More Useful Features In ProForms

  • SEND ACKNOWLEDGE DOCUMENT TO FORM SUBMIT USER ON FORM SUBMIT
  • SEND FORM DATA CC TO USER EMAIL
  • CUSTOMIZE USER EMAIL BODY
  • GOOGLE reCAPTHCA AVAILABLE
  • BUTTONS TEXT EDITING
  • CUSTOMIZE FORM BODY & OTHER ELEMENTS TEXT AND BUTTONS WITH FONT-SIZE & COLORPICKER
  • QUICK HELP & SUPPORT

Buy ProForms at witoni.com

Click Here To Buy Pro Version

HAVING QUESTIONS FOR ProForms OR CUSTOMIZATIONS ?

CLICK HERE to connect with us for live chat

PLUGIN SETTINGS

  • Click add new to create a new form
  • Class (Pass a custom class name for custom css)
  • Placeholder (Enter Placeholder Message)
  • Text field (Create field to enter text lines)
  • Select Field (Create dropdown with corresponding options)
  • Number (Accept Mobile Number, Age or custom limit by length)
  • Text Area (Create Text Area field for accepting address, description etc values)
  • Form Width (Give a custom form width to display in frontend)
  • Success Message (This text would show on successfull registration in frontend)
  • Shortcode (This shortcode would need to copy/paste where you want to display form)
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can create form in Multi Step Form Menu
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can create form in Multi Step Form Menu

Can i add more then 2 steps in Easy Multi Step Form Plugin ?

Yes you’re free to add unlimited steps or form levels in Easy Multi Step

Can i create more then 1 form in Easy Multi Step Form Plugin ?

You can create unlimited forms.

Can i redirect user after successful form submission ?

Yes, you can either redirect to url or show custom message in popup or both

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
